author: elfontan
body:
#### PR description:
A full set of xml files for the L1 emulation of prescales and masks coherent with the updated L1 menu for Run 3 has been created and pushed to [L1Trigger-L1TGlobal](https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TGlobal) ([PR#9](https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TGlobal/pull/9)). Once that these new files will be available in _cms-data_, we will proceed with the coherent update of these files. The update is targeting **CMSSW_12_3_0**.
The current version of the updated L1 Menu is [L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_0_0](https://github.com/cms-l1-dpg/L1MenuRun3/tree/master/development/L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_0_0).
(Previous reference PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37138)

In the context of the trigger studies for the preparation of the Run 3 menu (L1+HLT), we recently faced an issue related to the emulation of the L1 prescales. Two different issues were found out:
- format of the PS table (some documentation and a recipe can be found [here](https://github.com/cms-l1-dpg/L1MenuRun3/tree/master/development/L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_0_0/PrescaleTable));
- usage of the fractional PS ([PR#37046](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37046)).

#### PR validation:
Basic tests performed successfully starting from CMSSW_12_3_0_pre6.
From CMSSW_12_3_0_pre6/src:
> scram b distclean 
> git cms-checkdeps -a -A
> scram b -j 8
> scram b runtests
> scram build code-checks
> scram build code-format
title: Update of L1 prescales and masks files coherent with the v1_0_0 L1 menu for Run 3
